messages.message: Can we have the ability to interact with the llm directly without sending in our prompts or our ibdoc? Reason, there may be times I’d want to take the output of a section I brought back and do an additional nlp against it, or while we wait for the new ibdoc format to be able to take that line data and prompt myself.
Noted. I’ll add it to the backlog.

this is something we’re considering with the enterprise build. @joshbronko maybe it’ll be a good idea if I can set up some time with you today or tomorrow to talk about various ways you might want to access data about the document (ocr text, fields, classes etc).
I’m out today but if we can find time tomorrow or next week
